This is the high season for Elizabeth's business, and she hopes to make more profits during and after this season. She is 35 years old and married with three children. Her husband is a printer. She is a focused, hard worker. She is requesting for a loan amount of 50,000 NGN to purchase more used clothes to sell. She is indeed grateful to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more used clothes to sell

loans.name: Azalia Graciela

texts.es:
la sra. Azalia Graciela Z. tiene una pulperia desde hace 1 año la cual opera bajo el nombre de Pulpería y Variedades  "AZALIA" su negocio esta ubicado en su casa de habitación.
ella es casada y madre de 4 hijos, todos dependen su matrimonio, 3 estudian en la secundaria
y primaria de los centros educativos publicos de la ciudad de Danli. 
La  Sra Azalia es una mujer muy emprendedora con deseos de superacion ya que es una madre soltera y como madre, quiere dar todo lo mejor para sus hijos para que ellos se preparen y sean personas de bien en su vida. 
Su negocio le genera los recursos finanacieros para cumplir con las obligaciones en el hogar. Gracias a este credito el negocio de ella crecera un poco mas.
texts.en:
Señora Azalia Graciela Z. has had a convenience store for 1 year, which she operates under the name of "AZALIA Store and Varieties". Her business is located in her home. She is married and the mother of 4 children, all dependant on her. Three of her children attend secondary and primary schools of the city of Danli. Señora Azalia is a very enterprising woman who wants to improve herself, since she is now a single mother. As a mother, she wants to give the best to her children so that they will be prepared to be successful in their life. Her business provides her with the financial resources to meet the household obligations. Thanks to this loan seh will be able to grow her business a little more.

Translated from Spanish by Barbara (B) Brown, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy milk products, juice, canned good, churros, bread, crackers, beans, butter, cheese, fat, margarine, oil, rice, coffee, toothpaste, toilet paper, soup, etc for resale in her convenience store.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es:
Nuestro socio ANTONIO tiene 67 años es casado y tiene tres hijos que son independientes. El socio es chofer, tiene su propio automóvil para hacer el servicio de transporte turístico. EL socio hace el servicio por todo el Valle Sagrado de los Incas pues las agencias de viajes turísticos son los que solicitan sus servicios. Ya son varios años que hace el servicio y le ha ido muy bien gracias a todo el empeño que pone en su labor. Nuestro socio es un padre trabajador y emprendedor que saca adelante a su familia a pesar de las dificultades de la vida. El socio requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento al carro y desea adquirir repuestos para el carro que son muy importantes para su mejor funcionamiento. El socio nos cuenta que el principal medio para el sostén económico familiar es el carro por lo tanto tiene que estar operativo todos los días.
      
El socio pertenece al Banco Comunal “HUAYNA CCAPAC” de la Asociación Arariwa de la Provincia del Cusco del Departamento del Cusco.   

El socio se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma. En la foto el socio aparece acompañado de su nieta.
texts.en:
Antonio is 67 years old, married, and has 3 children who are independent. He is a driver; he has his own automobile that he uses to provide transport services for tourists. He conducts his business throughout the Valle Sagrado de los Incas (Sacred Valley of the Incas) for the tourism agencies that seek his services. He has been providing this service for a number of years now, and it has gone very well thanks to all of the effort that he puts into his work. He is an enterprising father who works hard to advance his family economically in spite of the difficulties of life. He needs a loan in order to carry out maintenance work on his car, and he also wishes to buy spare parts for the car that are very important to keep it running optimally. Antonio tells us that this car is the principal means through which he sustains his family economically, so he has to make sure that it is operating every day. He belongs to the communal bank "Huayna CCAPAC," which is part of the Arariwa Association in the province and department (region) of Cusco. He is very grateful for the opportunity provided through these means, and pledges to make his payments according to the established schedule. In the photograph, he is accompanied by his granddaughter.

Translated from Spanish by Lisa Grobar, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to maintain his automobile.

loans.name: Rachael

texts.en: N. Rachael is a 38-year-old businesswoman and mother of four children. For the past two years she has run a clothes shop in Abaita Ababiri trading centre. Rachael is using her loan to purchase more stock to sell in her shop. Her intentions are to work very hard to obtain a plot of land on which to build rental houses for monthly income.

loans.use: To purchase more stock for her clothes shop

loans.name: Maria Graciela

texts.es: La Sra. Maria tiene 36 años de edad es casada tine 2 hijos de 15 y 13 años de edad, su conyugue es profesor de educacion fisica, cuentan con casa propia de material noble el cual recien esta en construccion. La Sra. Maria cuenta con negocio de la venta de  productos de piñateria, vta de abarrotes,  alquiler de sillas para eventos. Ella se inicio hace 10 años, en este negocio. La Sra. Maria es una persona muy activa con muchas metas y objetivos, uno de ellos es poder tener otro negocio mas y tener su casa ya construida.Con el dinero que solicita invertira en capital de trabajo para invertir en capital de trabajo.
texts.en:
Maria is 36 years old. She is married and has two children who are 15 and 13 years old. Her spouse is a physical education teacher. They have their own brick home, which was recently built. Maria has a business selling piñata products, groceries and renting chairs for events. She began this business ten years ago. Maria is an active person with many goals and objectives. One of these is to be able to have another business and own her existing house. With the money she is requesting, she will invest in her business (as working capital).

Translated from Spanish by Kate Divjak, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Implementation of her business.

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Mercy M. is the 39-year-old married mother of two children. She lives with her family in Mikoroshoni, Mombasa where she sells secondhand clothes. Mercy's secondhand clothes business has been in operation for five years and has been doing well.

Mercy joined KADET recently and is taking out her first loan. She intends to purchase two bales of secondhand clothes for reselling. Her main customers are the area residents of Mikoroshoni.

In the future Mercy hopes to open a secondhand store in a more urban area to be able to serve more customers.

loans.use: To purchase two bales of secondhand clothes to resell.
